price: 68. Si, malgré tout, ils disputent avec toi à ce sujet, dis (-leur) : « Allah Sait le mieux ce que vous faites.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
